channel.title: Thursday Plantation
channel.itunes:subtitle: Produced between March and June of 2006, "Thursday Plantation", is hip-hop news, performances, interviews, music videos, and short films hosted by Larry Mizell Jr.
channel.itunes:author: Propadata Films
channel.itunes:summary: Produced between March and June of 2006, "Thursday Plantation", is hip-hop news, performances, interviews, music videos, and short films hosted by Larry Mizell Jr.
